name: CallSanta
0:
”Alexa Call Santa”
”Alexa Start Call Santa”
”Alexa Open Call Santa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call santa
des:
When you ask Alexa to call Santa it plays a nice message recording that seems to be making a call to Santa. You will get his voicemail, you can then pretend to leave a message.

The kids will love it. 

Special Notes: If you pretend to leave a voicemail it is not recording, and is never saved by us. It's just for fun.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
